reviews.customers_say: Customers like the sweater dress's style, with one noting its romantic lantern sleeves, and appreciate its soft material, comfort, and quality. The fit and size receive mixed feedback - while some find it true to size, others say it runs large and is oversized. The length and material thickness also get mixed reviews, with some praising the great length while others find it extremely short, and some describing the material as thick while others say it's very thin. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and soft sweater. Super cute on
items.body: I sometimes buy clothing on Amazon and cross my fingers. This looked super cute but when it arrived, I was soooo surprised. The blue is a beautiful antique color, the fit was perfect, I’m 5’6”, 165 lbs and it was a true large. I threw on a pair of leggings and off to the grocery store I go. LOVE this sweater Read more
items.author: Kim Twiss

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new favorite sweater
items.body: This is actually more comfortable than I expected. I would highly recommend this sweater. It’s soft, warm and versatile. You can wear it as a short dress, with jeans, yoga pants, etc. Fit was right on for size. Need more like this! Read more
items.author: Mandi Nichols

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars VERY NICE QUALITY...VERY PRETTY
items.body: The media could not be loaded. Id been wanting a sweater dress for quite some time. I finally broke down and bought one. As you will see in the video, it is roomy in my normal size of Large..has adorable poof sleeves. Cableknit and v-neck. This is beautiful and so soft..and will be perfect addition to your wardrobe. Read more
items.author: Tracy Carter

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and cozy.
items.body: Absolutely love this sweater is soft. It’s the perfect length can wear it as a dress or with some jeans and boots. It’s warm. It’s stretchy durable. It’s a nice winter sweater. Read more
items.author: Michelle benetier

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good
items.body: Very cute; very soft. Warm. About a medium thickness. Slightly flattering with a touch of flounce sleeves and a loose fit. I’d expect it to start looking not too great after 5ish washes. Shape is almost boxy. Quality is target quality. Read more
items.author: Happy Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sweater dress
items.body: Very soft and comfortable. True to size. Looks great! Read more
items.author: tracy ellis

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars So-so
items.body: Pretty, but very thin and see through. Sizing is good Read more
items.author: Jenny Smith

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater dress
items.body: Loved this. I'm 5'8", between 155 to 160. This was long enough I didn't need the slip skirt underneath it. The material is light, but warm and comfortable. It's soft too. Have gotten many compliments on it. Read more
items.author: Debbi Martinez

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Apricot, Pure White, Black, Rose Red, Pink, Beige, Olive-green, Caramel, Red Dahlia, Denim Blue, Green, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
